scripts.build-doc: rm -rf docs/; node_modules/.bin/jsdoc --configure config/jsdoc/internal.json; node_modules/.bin/jsdoc --configure config/jsdoc/public.json
scripts.publish: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && npm run build && npm run build-doc && git commit -a -m "Auto generated gh-pages" && git push && git checkout master
